scripts.build:fonts: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path src/fonts) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist/fonts > $null; Copy-Item -Path src/fonts/* -Destination dist/fonts -Force }"
scripts.build:js: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist/scripts > $null; Copy-Item -Path src/scripts/popup.js -Destination dist/scripts/popup.js -Force"
scripts.watch:js: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$src=\"src/scripts/popup.js\"; $dest=\"dist/scripts\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dest > $null; while ($true) { if (Test-Path $src) { Copy-Item -Path $src -Destination (Join-Path $dest 'popup.js') -Force }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1 }"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:js
